{{ #widget : Search
  | queries = {{
   {{ queryPattern = 'PREFIX search: <http://www.openrdf.org/contrib/lucenesail#>
       SELECT ?Page ?Snippet
       WHERE {
         { SELECT ?Page ?Snippet
           WHERE {
             ?Page search:matches ?match .
             ?match search:query ?:Keywords ;
                    search:property System:wiki ;
                    search:snippet ?Snippet ;
                    search:score ?score .
           } ORDER BY DESC(?score) LIMIT 1000
         }
         FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?Page), "http://www.fluidops.com/help/"))
       }' | parameters = {{  {{ name = 'Keywords' | parameterType = 'LUCENE' | componentType = 'TEXTFIELD'}} }} | queryTargets = 'WIKI'}} }}
}}
